data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulations 30, 33 and other applicable provisions read with Schedule III of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we submit herewith the Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter ended June 30, 2021, duly approved by the Board of Directors at its meeting held on August 12, 2021.The Limited Review Report thereon issued by the Statutory Auditors, M/s. MSKC & Associates, Chartered Accountants (ICAI Firm Registration No. 001595S) is also attached.
A copy of aforesaid Unaudited Financial Results, Limited Review Report, a copy of Press Release and the Investor Presentation on financial and business performance of the Bank for quarter ended June 30, 2021 are attached herewith.
